programme.desc: Tari gets news that her boss's son is working in her office. Tari thinks her boss's son is Langit, not Gala because it's impossible for her boss to ask his son to work as an office boy. However, several incidents make Tari close to Gala because Gala is so attentive to Tari.

programme.title: BARAYA URANG PASUNDAN - EP 19
programme.desc: Semi-documentary that explores a region of West Java lived by Sundanese

programme.title: MAD ABOUT - EP 24
programme.desc: A semi documentary magazine that show the world of hobbies and interest

programme.title: HOT SHOT - EP 505
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang membahas kehidupan selebriti secara mendalam.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 16
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: Dilihat-lihat Cinta Ini Yang Paling Jauh
programme.desc: After getting a job as Vania's guard, Cakra also ends up guarding Vania's heart. It all started with fighting over bread and eventually ended with them falling in love.

programme.title: Aku Senang Kalo Kamu Bek Bek Aja?
programme.desc: Mela's marriage to Jordy failed due to her father's disapproval. Dion, a wealthy mama's boy, came to the village and met Mela herding ducks. It turned out that Dion and Mela's mother were friends from college and intended to arrange a marriage for their children.

programme.title: LIGA DANGDUT 2021 - EP 16
programme.desc: 70 Ambassadors from 34 Provinces compete for the Champion of the Largest Dangdut Competition in Indonesia. Best display, spectacular stage.

programme.title: GASPOL - EP 82
programme.desc: Gaspol, an SCTV game show hosted by Raffi Ahmad, is filled with prizes and tens of millions of rupiah in cash.

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 17 - EP 25
programme.desc: With the theme of Heaven's Fugitive, Bang Jack has to deal with debt collectors who have minimal religious knowledge to teach them to become sharia-compliant debt collectors.

programme.title: HONESTLY GUE TUH SUKA SAMA DIA, BUT SHE CAN'T WITH ME
programme.desc: Jamilah was taking Enyak to a wedding, but on the way, some vendors were threatened by thugs and even beaten up for refusing to pay protection money. Jamilah got out to help because the thugs were causing traffic jams. Enyak complained because she wanted to attend the wedding, but Jamilah's spirit as a warrior could not be stopped. Jamilah fought against the four thugs because they were indeed a gang of extortionists. Fortunately, Hafizah and Annisa were nearby, so they joined in to help.

programme.title: CINTA SUCI - EP 23
programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. On the other hand, Monica hates Suci because she thinks Suci forced Marcel to marry her.

programme.title: Pelan Pelan Bejek Cintanya Neng Supir Uwiuwiuw
programme.desc: Aryo's mother advises him to go to Jakarta to find his uncle. However, along the way, he becomes stranded in a village in Tasikmalaya. He meets Lala, an ambulance driver who helps him. Aryo is forced to disguise himself as Christ Marto, a foreigner who is going to perform in the village.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 477
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 151
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: I LOVE YOU ISTRI DADAKAN
programme.desc: Lastri has just found work in Jakarta as a maid. Calvin is a single man who has only been dating Cika for a week, a widow with one child whom Calvin doesn't know about. Cika was known to be a con artist, who had conned Calvin by using the pretext of paying for his child's hospital bills. Lastri, who wanted to escape because she was working with the wrong people, was eventually accused of being part of Cika's gang. Finally, Calvin arrested Lastri and Cika's son, Viko, and took her to his house.

programme.title: CINTA SUCI - EP 23
programme.desc: Suci, who is entangled in problems, must marry Marcel because she desperately needs money for the medical expenses of her husband and children, Aditya and Ronny, so that they can both stay alive. programme.title: Jodoh Gak Seprofesi, I'm Not Father
programme.desc: Jodoh Gak Seprofesi, I'm Not Father is a story about the life of a beautiful girl who loves dangdut music and likes to make live content, her name is Lena. On the other hand, there is a handsome meatball seller who loves K-Pop dance, he is Juna. It is told that Juna and Lena were live together, and they ended up arguing, because they felt disturbed by each other. Both of them didn't care, even though someone asked them to make collabs.

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: Two twin sisters who lived by one promise - 'We will always be together. We will never separate'. Later, the ghost of dead haunt the surviving sister. Release Year: 2015 Director: Bhushan Patel

programme.title: Jaal: The Trap
programme.desc: To save his kidnapped girlfriend Neha from terrorists, Ajay is forced to abduct the home minister's daughter, Anita, only to uncover a shocking truth behind the plot. Release Year: 2003 Director: Guddu Dhanoa

programme.title: Don Aur Doctor
programme.desc: An honest doctor, Das, befriends Deva, a feared gangster. But when duty clashes with loyalty, their strong friendship faces a heartbreaking test.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: Actress J. Jayalalithaa, guided by mentor M.G. Ramachandran, enters politics but must navigate the challenges of a male-dominated political world to make her mark.

programme.title: Ka Pae Ranasaingam
programme.desc: Ariyanachi, a poor woman, fights against corruption, politics, and bureaucracy to bring her late husband's body home from Dubai, showcasing her strength and determination.

programme.title: Ishqedarriyaan
programme.desc: Difficulties arise when Aagam, a millionaire, falls in love with Luvleen, a teacher. However, she is in love with Arjun. Release Year: 2015 Director: V.K. Prakash

programme.title: Second Hand Husband
programme.desc: Gurpreet and Rajbir to marry each other but Rajbir's compulsion to pay alimony to his ex-wife Neha seems a hurdle. To get rid of constraint, they must convince Neha to marry someone.

programme.title: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
programme.desc: The trio reunites in the UK and they fall in love, become involved with a nightclub, and have to face up to the challenge of a local don. Release Year: 2013 Director: Sangeeth Sivan

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Shivam, a hitman, is asked to keep an eye on his boss's mistress. However, he soon learns that she has been a victim of sex trafficking and decides to unite her with her lover. Release Year: 2007 Director: Mohit Suri

programme.title: Khamoshi
programme.desc: A young woman, who lives alone and has a speech and hearing disability, attempts to save herself when a killer appears at her doorstep. Release Year: 2019 Director: Chakri Toleti

programme.desc: Punjabi man Harinder falls for Kashmiri woman Aayat, but years of separation from riots, terrorism, and an India-Pakistan war test their love and determination to reunite.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM

programme.title: Roumanie, Le Charme Des Balkans
programme.desc: On the southern fringes of Eastern Europe, francophone and francophile, Romania remains little known. Yet, in the heart of its sublime landscapes, its people have succeeded in keeping their culture and traditions alive. From architectural heritage to natural parks, Romania is a land of untold surprises to explore.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 7
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 5
programme.desc: Warnier finds it impossible to go into prison to give his lessons; Paule decides to accompany him, whether he likes it or not. Inside she meets Julien Ocelot and immediately agrees to handle his defence. Irene gets over her depression and regains custody of her son, Paule is devastated.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 6

programme.desc: The High Priestess administers a mouthful of her potion to each of the Komians. Ebri Morrow's troops are at the gates of Kumassi. As they reach the pond, they put the final touches to their strategy. Pokou sets off for her third challenge.

programme.title: Selon La Police

For a day and a night, his colleagues search for him in the city and his home neighbourhood. But each hour that passes brings Ping-Pong closer to his destiny...

programme.title: Au Revoir Jerome !

programme.title: Le Coffre

programme.desc: Sanjay and Nithi are best friends since childhood. Soon, Sanjay realises that he is in love with Nithi but refrains from confessing his feelings out of respect for their friendship.

programme.desc: When an intoxicated dog bites a security guard, unleashing a zombie outbreak in a hill station, Karthik, a policeman, takes up the responsibility of helping a team of doctors to find the antidote.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 15
programme.desc: From San Sebastian to London and with over 180 games together over the past seven years, Mikel Merino and Martin Zubimendi know each other very well. Having played alongside one another for Real Sociedad, the Spanish national team and now Arsenal, the pair are key figures in the Gunners' fast start to the season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: Ahead of the first North London derby of the season, we sit down with the man who made one of most controversial transfers in World football; Sol Campbell. He opens up about his decision to leave Tottenham for their fiercest rivals, Arsenal, the intense pressure of returning to White Hart Lane that first season, and how he's dealt with the fallout ever since. A fascinating insight into the 'move that shook North London'.

programme.title: FANZONE - FRI 28 NOV (Live)
programme.desc: This is the show that puts international fans at the heart of the Premier League conversation. We connect with fans from around the world as they share their views on their teams and favourite players.

programme.title: FS MMA David Balzer vs. Joel Liddacoat
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Joel Liddacoat comes face to face with David Balzer in a brutal scrap in front of fight fans at the CN Centre in British Columbia, Canada.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Lovemore N'Dou vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features 'The Black Panther', Lovemore N'dou, (45-8, 30 KOs) defending his IBF Junior Welterweight Title against an upstart Paul 'Magic Man' Malignaggi (22-1, 5 KOs) on June 16, 2007 at the Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville, Connecticut, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Tyson Fury vs. Steve Cunningham
programme.desc: This episode features a Heavyweight bout between the unpredictable and unbeaten Tyson Fury as we works his way up the ranks taking on former champ Steve Cunningham, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner facing Martin Rodriguez for the vacant WBO super featherweight title. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champions Paul Williams and Kermit Cintron.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Tochinoshin, Daieisho, Ichinojo and Kotoshogiku from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Erik Morales vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: This episode features a Super Lightweight title bout that goes the full 12 rounds, between the unbeaten Danny Garcia and veteran Erik Morales, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 3 of 4.

programme.title: WCCB Otto Wallin vs. Gianluca Mandras
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallin's hometown of Sundsvall in the city's premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallin's homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The second group of competitors race each other and the clock to complete Stage 1. In addition to old nemeses like the Giant Ring and Jumping Spider, contestants will face new obstacles: Piston Road and the Silk Slider.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Canelo Alvarez vs. Kermit Cintron
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Canelo Alvarez taking on Kermit Cintron in a bout that helped elevate Alvarez into the light middleweight title picture and take another step towards becoming one of the biggest names in boxing. Also on the card, action from a classic battle between Joel Casamayor and Michael Katsidis for the WBO Lightweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Hakuho, Yutakayama, Kotoshogiku and Abi from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the first ever Judo Grand Prix from Cancun, stop to get to know number 2 ranked fighter in the world Tal Flicker, and show a demonstration on how to execute one of Flicker's favorite submissions.

programme.title: Prison Fighters

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 29

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly… he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled… until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Snake did have legs… hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 7

They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China._x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Hirayasumi" Eps. 16
programme.desc: A warm and bittersweet drama based on the internationally beloved manga by Shinzo Keigo. Ikuta Hiroto (Okayama Amane), 29, has no job, no romantic partner, and none of the usual worries about the future. Drawn to his easygoing personality, a local elderly woman gives him a single-story house. He begins living with his 18-year-old cousin Natsumi (Mori Nana), who has just moved to Tokyo from Yamagata. Before long, people carrying quiet burdens begin to gather around him.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. The discussions ranging from controvercial topics to gossip and current events. Moreover, surprises from the guests of the show often go beyond all your expectation that you don't want to miss out!

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: i Walker

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 11
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2690
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Not Far From Here
programme.desc: Even with limited vacation time, you can still explore the Greater Bay Area, thanks to this show! C Kwan, Billy Luk and Karen Wu team up to discover the Greater Bay Area, savouring modern Cantonese cuisine, exquisite French food, dessert Omakase and more!

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 5
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2692
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Under The Moonlight - EP 29
programme.desc: The drama is adapted from Shui He's novel "Under The Moonlight ". It tells the story of Luo Shu, who is trapped in the quagmire of fate but still tries to save herself, and meets Qi Menglin, who is full of vigour and only wants to roam the world. The two work together to solve cases.

programme.title: Christian's Choice
programme.desc: Adhering to the principles of authentic, independently owned restaurants with a long history, host Christian Yang curates a selection of restaurants, exploring the hidden, heartwarming stories behind these establishments and appreciating the spirit of Hong Kong's culinary culture.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

Mrs Chiu has a stroke and faints as she hears Ho-yee mentioning she has no marriage plan. After being resuscitated, Mrs Chiu scolds Rio for lying. Ho-yee helps cover up his lies.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 764
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 8
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 17
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: Get On A Flat - EP 13
programme.desc: Rewind to the 2008 financial crisis and supermarket manager Che Chi-ming (Andrew Lam) hurriedly sells his apartment. Who could have known even though Chi-ming has been chasing after property prices for 14 years, he still cannot get on the property ladder once again. A middle class lifestyle is tragically transformed into a "midlife crisis"._x000D__x000D_Chi-ming’s wife Man Wai (Elena Kong) is obsessed with property ownership. She goes to work as a part-time maid at some luxury home.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 22
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 34
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 39
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao's real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus' Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General's daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls' high school, is stuck with a baby that isn't his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Return To The 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of 'scaffolding kung fu".

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: Gan Dai Xiong is killed by Prince Wu, who seeks to seize his Purple Sword. Prince Wu's son join forces with an evil gang to steal the Purple Sword from Gan Dai Xiong's three daughters. Eventually, Gan's daughters team up with their cousin Xu to avenge their father's death.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - "Twelve Deadly Coins" and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money! Futuristic program scenes with video game clearing concept, where challengers engage in the intellectual competition to switch on the ATM. Those who won goes to the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: i Walker
programme.desc: Eight i Walkers take you around the world in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 19
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 10
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 21
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2023 - EP 13
programme.desc: Experience the strength of international female solidarity as talented performers from diverse industries unite to showcase the beauty of Chinese culture and surpass their own limits in the highly anticipated season of Sisters.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 20
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Perfect Match 11 - EP 40
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 332
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Divas Hit the Road 7 - EP 10
programme.desc: Join Na Ying and a lively team of seven as they dive into a 25 day Silk Road trip filled with cultural encounters, heartfelt moments, and self-discovery, bringing Chinese culture to life on a global stage.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 90
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: Final Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: Jigong (Xiao Zhengnan) was originally a saint, however he falls into the mortal world for the investigation of some cases. Later, he loses all memories, becomes a mortal and leads a life with other villagers.

programme.title: Perfect Match 11 - EP 40
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 194
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: World's No. 1: Philippines - EP 2
programme.desc: Dive into The World's No.1: Philippines, an exhilarating journey through a nation bursting with color, flavor, and life! From bustling street markets and fiery kitchens to hidden natural wonders and heartwarming local stories, every stop unveils the true spirit and irresistible charm of the Philippines.

programme.title: Mr Player - EP 69
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 22
programme.desc: The story revolves around seven lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 5 - EP 12
programme.desc: A brand-new, high-stakes format "Alliance Battles with Group Elimination" kicks off this season. Seven teams are divided into two alliances, sharing votes within each. The alliance with the lowest total votes will see an entire team eliminated. A gripping battle of passion, teamwork, and perseverance unfolds among the brothers. Who will rise, and who will fall?

Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Top Star - EP 6
programme.desc: Top Star showcases battles akin to grand concerts, with intense clashes amplifying musical prowess, culminating in a versatile, well-rounded singing sensation.

programme.title: Final Destiny - EP 3
programme.desc: Jigong (Xiao Zhengnan) was originally a saint, however he falls into the mortal world for the investigation of some cases. Later, he loses all memories, becomes a mortal and leads a life with other villagers.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 334
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: James' Going Places - EP 63
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 5 - EP 13
programme.desc: A brand-new, high-stakes format "Alliance Battles with Group Elimination" kicks off this season. Seven teams are divided into two alliances, sharing votes within each. The alliance with the lowest total votes will see an entire team eliminated. A gripping battle of passion, teamwork, and perseverance unfolds among the brothers. Who will rise, and who will fall?

programme.title: Subtle Flavors - EP 1
programme.desc: Embark on a food journey across Sichuan, Hunan, and Guangdong. From time-honored recipes to innovative twists, discover the tastes that carry deep cultural roots and heartfelt stories.

programme.title: The Pride of Hunan Cuisine 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Get your taste buds ready to discover temptations in the form of great food in Hunan cuisine. Your appetite will be stimulated through the exploration of distinctive cooking techniques and the use of ingredients in Hunan cuisine.

programme.title: James' Going Places - EP 63
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 11
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: The Litchi Road - EP 35
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Adapted from the same-name novel, the drama features a minor official, Li Shande (Lei Jia Yin), during the Tang Dynasty. He overcomes numerous hardships and travels thousands of miles to deliver lychees from Gaozhou in Lingnan to Chang’an.
